Fizeram diversos filmes, como as Namoradas do Papai e, mais adolescentes, No Pique de Nova York.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Giphy</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page3"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/entretenimento/c3/2019/07/03/ashley-e-mary-kate-olsen-em-2019-1562174189854_v2_420x747.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer>   <amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset"> <div class="grid-third overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   ">  <div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-center grid-cta">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">As Olsen aos 33</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">Ashley (esq) e Mary-Kate hoje trabalham com moda e foram premiadas em junho por uma coleção. Além disso, Mary-Kate tem disputado competições de hipismo.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div Culkin</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">Astro de Esqueceram de Mim, amigo de Michael Jackson e, um pouco depois, um adolescente problemático, Culkin ficou um bom tempo sumido das páginas de celebridades.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div animate-top"><span class="title-block">Culkin aos 38</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">Curiosamente, ele voltou a chamar atenção quando entrou no Twitter, em 2018, e apareceu em entrevistas de TV e premiações.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div sua personagem, mas também foi filha de Cher em Minha Mãe é uma Sereia e fez Gasparzinho.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" animate-top"><span class="title-block">Ricci aos 39</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">Ricci segue na ativa. Foi protagonista da série Z: The Beginning of Everything, sempre faz ensaios fotográficos e gosta de mudar o visual, principalmente a cor do cabelo.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Reprodução/Instagram</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page8"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">   <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/VcBNBEhoOZpolb9MPK/giphy.gif"></amp-img>   </amp-story-grid-layer>   <amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset"> <div class="grid-third overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   ">  <div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-center ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Haley Joel Osment</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">"Eu vejo gente morta". Quem não se cansou de citar essa frase do filme O Sexto Sentido, de 1999? Vale lembrar que Haley esteve também em Forrest Gump quando tinha seis anos.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Giphy</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page9"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/entretenimento/e6/2019/07/04/haley-joel-osment-aos-31-anos-1562253114035_v2_420x747.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer>   <amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset"> <div class="grid-third overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   ">  <div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-center ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Haley aos 31</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">O rosto mais cheio e a barba deixaram Haley bem diferente. Ele tem feito a série Teachers e poderá ser visto nos cinemas, no filme Ted Bundy: A Irresistível Face do Mal.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Getty Images</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page10"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">   <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/Cjk1IJ7aLdf56/giphy.gif"></amp-img>   </amp-story-grid-layer>   <amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset"> <div class="grid-third overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   ">  <div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-center ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Jonathan Lipnicki</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">O garotinho de Jerry Maguire, a Grande Virada, tinha cinco anos na época. Depois, trabalhou também em Dr. Dolittle, Stuart Little e O Pequeno Vampiro.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset class="grid-third valign-bottom text-center ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Jonathan aos 28</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">O ator admitiu recentemente que ficou sumido, em uma fase mais sombria da vida, mas reapareceu fortão e tem sido visto na mídia, inclusive participando de um reality show de culinária.</div>  </ul></ul></div> Images</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page12"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">   <amp-img layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset"> <div class="grid-third overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   ">  <div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-center ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Fred Savage</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">O protagonista de Anos Incríveis marcou época de 1988 a 1993 como Kevin Arnold e também é sempre lembrado pela aventura A Princesa Prometida.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Giphy</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page13"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">   <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/l41lSLto3wzWuN9Be/giphy.gif"></amp-img>   </amp-story-grid-layer>   <amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset"> <div class="grid-third overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   ">  <div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-center ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Fred aos 42</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">A carinha ainda é parecida, mas o tempo passou. Hoje estrela Amigos da Faculdade, da Netflix, e dublou nas animações BoJack Horseman e American Dad!.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Giphy</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page14"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">   <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/uuY5u6QB00NbO/giphy.gif"></amp-img>   </amp-story-grid-layer>   <amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset"> <div class="grid-third overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   ">  <div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-center ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Dakota Fanning</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">Ela começou aos seis anos e logo cedo atuou em séries como Plantão Médico e CSI, além de chamar atenção no cinema, com Uma Lição de Amor e Grande Menina, Pequena Mulher.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Giphy</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page15"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/8b/2018/02/06/filme-tudo-que-quero-1517925622908_420x747.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer>   <amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset"> <div class="grid-third overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   ">  <div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-center ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Dakota aos 25</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">A carreira da norte-americana segue a todo vapor, com papéis em Era Uma Vez em... Hollywood e Oito Mulheres e um Segredo, além de indicações regulares a premiações voltadas ao público jovem.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Reprodução</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page16"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">   <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/1UIlw4wHUTs8U/giphy.gif"></amp-img>   </amp-story-grid-layer>   <amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset"> <div class="grid-third overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   ">  <div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-center ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Cole Sprouse</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">Cole Sprouse fez fama ao lado do seu gêmeo Dylan principalmente em Zack & Cody: Gêmeos em Ação. Além disso, esteve em Friends, Paizão e Confusões no Natal, entre outros.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Giphy</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>  <amp-story-page id="page17"><amp-story-grid-layer template="fill" class="">  <amp-img width="720" height="1280" layout="responsive" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/entretenimento/de/2019/07/04/cole-e-dylan-sprouse-1562263594186_v2_420x747.jpg"></amp-img>    </amp-story-grid-layer>   <amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class=" layer-image reset">   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset"> <div class="grid-third overlayText"></div>   </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds  layer-text title-text   ">  <div class="grid-third valign-bottom text-center ">  <h1 class="title animate-top"><span class="title-block">Cole e Dylan aos 26</span></h1>  <div class="text animate-top">Os irmãos não têm feito trabalhos juntos. Cole (à direita) é um dos destaques de Riverdale, enquando Dylan não vem aparecendo em grandes filmes - mas é sempre lembrado na mídia pelo namoro com Barbara Palvin.</div>  </ul></ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-thirds reset credit-image"><div class="grid-third valign-bottom"><div class="credit-author"> <span class="author">Getty Images</span>   <span class="author"></span>  </div></div></amp-story-grid-layer>   </amp-story-page>   <amp-story-page id="credits"><amp-story-grid-layer template="vertical" class="grid-row-half layer-sponsors bg-dark"><div class="grid-first valign-top halign-center">   <div class="logo"><amp-img width="165" height="52" layout="flex-item" src="https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/ampstories/logos/uol-light.png"></amp-img></div>    <div class="content-center text-center">  <div class="published"><span>Publicado em 06 de julho de 2019.</span></div>  Reportagem: Maurício Dehò</div></div><div class="grid-second valign-bottom halign-center"><p class="sponsors-title"></p><ul class="sponsors ">  <li class="sponsor-list">  </li>  </ul></div>  </amp-story-grid-layer></amp-story-page>  <amp-story-bookend src="https://entretenimento.uol.com.br/service/?loadComponent=amp-stories-bookend&data={"items": [{}], "topo": {}, "share": {"image":"https://conteudo.imguol.com.br/c/entretenimento/60/2019/06/26/tyler-james-williams-em-todo-mundo-odeia-o-chris-2005-e-atualmente-1561574147302_v2_750x421.jpg","facebook-title":false,"facebook-description":false,"twitter-title":"Antes e depois: Como estão os astros mirins das séries e do cinema","twitter-title-dialog":"Antes e depois: Como estão os astros mirins das séries e do cinema - Eles cresceram - UOLEntretenimento","url":"https://entretenimento.uol.com.br/amp-stories/eles-cresceram-veja-antes-e-depois-dos-astros-mirins/"}}" layout="nodisplay"></amp-story-bookend></amp-story> </body> </html>
title: Antes e depois: Como estão os astros infantis mirins das séries e do cinema
